import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '', }) const { name, email, password, password2 } = formData const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (password !== password2) { console.log('Password do not match') } else { console.log('SUCCESS') } } return (
